subject: Running
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Runner Macharia Yuot is one of the Lost Boys of Sudan, the 25,000 or so youngsters who, over a span of years, walked from Sudan to Ethiopia to Kenya to escape death.
snippet: Runner Macharia Yuot is one of the Lost Boys of Sudan, the 25,000 or so youngsters who, over a span of years, walked from Sudan to Ethiopia to Kenya to escape death.
